0.title: [stationName] Growing Season
0.subTitle: Maximum number of consecutive days above zero Celcius
0.caption: The Frost-free season is the approximate length of the growing season, during which there are no freezing temperatures to kill or damage plants. This is calculated from temperature data.

1.title: [stationName] Growing Season Difference (Days) from Baseline<Paste>
1.caption: Difference between the maximum number of days above zero for the year and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990. This is calculated from temperature data.

avg.name: Growing Season [Number of consecutive days above freezing (> 0°C)]

diff.name: Growing Season [Number of consecutive days above freezing (> 0°C)]
